com.fr.funrungame.controller.entities

Class PlayerBody

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fr.funrungame.controller.entities.EntityBody
      • com.fr.funrungame.controller.entities.PlayerBody

  • public class PlayerBody
extends EntityBody
    A concrete representation of an EntityBody representing the player.
